page.title: 10Parkend Memorial Hall
page.content: The hall which is in a prominent position was erected in memory to men and women who died in the first world war.It was opened in 1919 and has been the venue of all social activities since.Following the second world war a further tablet was added showing the names of those killed on active service. The hall has recently been extensively renovated and is again fully used by organisations in the village. A committee consisting of representatives of all the village organisations meet each month .They arrange some social event each month as a fund raising effort .The village band use it for practice and for concerts. The womens institute meet monthly and the friendly circle hold meetings twice monthly.
